member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device
member.summary: A generic base class for physical devices.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Index
member.summary: Gets the device's index.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.DeviceClass
member.summary: Gets the device's class instance.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Path
member.summary: Gets the device's path.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.InstanceHandle
member.summary: Gets the device's instance handle.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Class
member.summary: Gets the device's class name.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.ClassGuid
member.summary: Gets the device's class Guid as a string.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Description
member.summary: Gets the device's description.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.FriendlyName
member.summary: Gets the device's friendly name.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Capabilities
member.summary: Gets the device's capabilities.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.IsUsb
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this device is a USB device.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Parent
member.summary: Gets the device's parent device or null if this device has not parent.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.RemovableDevices
member.summary: Gets this device's list of removable devices. Removable devices are parent devices that can be removed.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.Eject(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ejects the device.
member.param: Pass true to allow the Windows shell to display any related UI element, false otherwise.
member.returns: null if no error occured, otherwise a contextual text.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Device.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the comparands.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceCapabilities
member.summary: Contains constants for determining devices capabilities. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceClass
member.summary: A generic base class for physical device classes.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceClass.#ctor(System.Guid,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DeviceClass class.
member.param: The handle of the top-level window to be used for any user interface or IntPtr.Zero for no handle.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceClass.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceClass.ClassGuid
member.summary: Gets the device class's guid.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DeviceClass.Devices
member.summary: Gets the list of devices of this device class.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DiskDeviceClass
member.summary: The device class for disk devices.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.DiskDeviceClass.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DiskDeviceClass class.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume
member.summary: A volume device.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.VolumeName
member.summary: Gets the volume's name.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.LogicalDrive
member.summary: Gets the volume's logical drive in the form [letter]:\

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.IsUsb
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this volume is a based on USB devices.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.Disks
member.summary: Gets a list of underlying disks for this volume.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.RemovableDevices
member.summary: Gets a list of removable devices for this volume.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.Volume.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that indicates the relative order of the comparands.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.UsbEject.VolumeDeviceClass
member.summary: The device class for volume devices.

member.name: M:MontarUSB.UsbEject.VolumeDeviceClass.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the VolumeDeviceClass class.

member.name: T:MontarUSB.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Clase de recurso fuertemente tipado, para buscar cadenas traducidas, etc.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Devuelve la instancia de ResourceManager almacenada en caché utilizada por esta clase.

member.name: P:MontarUSB.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Reemplaza la propiedad CurrentUICulture del subproceso actual para todas las búsquedas de recursos mediante esta clase de recurso fuertemente tipado.
